attributes.action: Protect the rights of Canadian First Nations, Stop Bill C-45
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned respectfully request that the Foreign  Secretary make representations to the Canadian Prime Minister, to request that he meet with First Nations representatives.
We would also request that the Foreign Secretary  point out to the Canadian Prime Minister that Bills C-45, C-27, S-2, S-6, S-8, C-428, S-207, and S-212 are in contravention of Articles 18, 19 & 20 of the United Nations Declaration on the Rights of Indigenous Peoples.
